put.summary: [EXPERIMENTAL] Updates contents of a file in Drive.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: Identifier of the file.

schema.description: Identifier of the file.
File contents.

400.description: The details of the input related failure

parameters.name: page
parameters.description:
The pagination token to use to continue listing contents from a previous call to list contents.
            This value is returned from the previous call. If a pagination token is provided the sortBy and filter fields
            must not have changed since the original request. Also, if set, a start value cannot be provided.

schema.description:
The pagination token to use to continue listing contents from a previous call to list contents.
            This value is returned from the previous call. If a pagination token is provided the sortBy and filter fields
            must not have changed since the original request. Also, if set, a start value cannot be provided.

parameters.name: sortBy
parameters.description: Order the results by these fields. Use use the '-' sign to denote descending order.

schema.description: Order the results by these fields. Use use the '-' sign to denote descending order.

parameters.name: start
parameters.description: When paginating, skip this number of results.

schema.description: When paginating, skip this number of results.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: When paginating, limit the number of returned results to this many.

schema.description: When paginating, limit the number of returned results to this many.

parameters.name: filter
parameters.description: Expression to filter the result set.

schema.description: Expression to filter the result set.

400.description: The details of the input related failure

parameters.description: True if the destination has file with same name if should be overwritten

400.description: The details of the input related failure

get.summary: [EARLY ACCESS] Get resources available for access control
get.description: Get the comprehensive set of resources that are available for access control

path.description: Path of the folder or file

name.description: Name of the folder or file

createdBy.description: Identifier of the user who created the file or folder

updatedBy.description: Identifier of the last user to modify the file or folder

type.description: Type of storage object (file or folder)

size.description: Size of the file in bytes

StorageObject.description: An object representation of a drive file or folder

UpdateFile.description: DTO representing the update of the name or path of a file

CreateFolder.description: DTO representing the creation of a folder

UpdateFolder.description: DTO representing the update of the name or path of a file
